name: Second Serve
instructions:
1. Add all ingredients except soda water to a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake and strain into an ice-filled Collins glass.
3. Top with soda and garnish with a half orange wheel.
description: As a lower-alcohol, softer-hitting cocktail recipe, this combination of Amaro Montenegro and fino sherry is a Spain vs. Italy matchup.

ingredients.name: Amaro Montenegro
ingredients.description: Although not as popular as Averna, Montenegro packs an incredible bouquet of flavors ranging from carmel and chocolate to chartreuse-like herbals, all at a very workable price. As an added bonus, Montenegro is delicious on the rocks and sports an eye-catching bottle.

ingredients.name: Fino
ingredients.description: Fino sherry is a dry, pale, and delicate fortified wine from Spainâ€™s Jerez region, known for its light body and crisp, nutty flavor. It is aged under a layer of flor (a protective yeast) in a process called biological aging, which prevents oxidation and gives it a fresh, slightly saline taste. This method results in a sherry that is bone-dry with notes of almonds, green apples, fresh bread, and a hint of sea breeze.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.
